diff_hunk:
@@ -723,7 +724,43 @@ tf_kernel_library(
 tf_kernel_library(
     name = "tile_ops",
     prefix = "tile_ops",
-    deps = ARRAY_DEPS,
+    deps = ARRAY_DEPS + [":tile_functor"],
+)
+
+tf_kernel_library(
+    name = "tile_functor",
+    srcs = ["tile_functor_cpu.cc"],
+    hdrs = ["tile_functor.h"],
+    gpu_srcs = [
+        "tile_functor_gpu.cu.cc",
+        "tile_functor.h",
+    ],
+    visibility = ["//visibility:private"],
+    deps = [
+        "//tensorflow/core:framework",
+        "//third_party/eigen3",
+    ],
+    alwayslink = 0,
+)
+
+tf_cc_test(
+    name = "tile_op_test",
+    size = "small",
+    srcs = ["tile_op_test.cc"],
+    deps = [
+        ":ops_testutil",
+        ":ops_util",
+        ":tile_functor",
body: tile_op_test depend on tile_ops, tile_ops depend on tile_functor. As said above, I'll merge tile_functor into tile_ops.
body_html: tile_op_test depend on tile_ops, tile_ops depend on tile_functor. As said above, I'll merge tile_functor into tile_ops.
body_text: tile_op_test depend on tile_ops, tile_ops depend on tile_functor. As said above, I'll merge tile_functor into tile_ops.
